item.title: 1. Granularity

item.title: 2. Flatness
item.description: Store notes in one container Encourages new connections beyond externally imposed categories Prevents duplicate work Scales with the system Notes are retrieved primarily through contextual relations Finding notes based on the way they link to other notes (see 3.

item.title: 3. Interconnection
item.description: Linking notes liberally is the core of the system Uses relations between notes to find, organize, and contextualize them Treats research as a process of relationship-building Next: 4.
